---

  "Provision a new bucket in the organization account, also creates the
  organization account if it doesn't exist. This is an"

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Provision a new bucket"}
></Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/providers/{provider_id}/orgs/{org_id}/provision"}
></MethodEndpoint>

Provision a new bucket in the organization account, also creates the
organization account if it doesn't exist. This is an idempotent operation, and
calling it multiple times with the same parameters will not create duplicate
buckets.

Provisioning API responds with an access key and secret to access the newly
provisioned bucket.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
></Heading>

<details
  style={{ marginBottom: "1rem" }}
  className={"openapi-markdown__details"}
  data-collapsed={false}
  open={true}
>
  <summary style={{}}>
    <h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>
      Path Parameters
    </h3>
  </summary>
  <div>
    <ul>
      <ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{
          name: "provider_id",
          in: "path",
          required: true,
          description: "Provider ID",
          schema: { type: "string" },
        }}
      ></ParamsItem>
      <ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{
          name: "org_id",
          in: "path",
          required: true,
          description: "Organization ID",
          schema: { type: "string" },
        }}
      ></ParamsItem>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details>
<MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}>
  <TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}>
    <details
      style={{}}
      className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"}
      data-collapsed={false}
      open={true}
    >
      <summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}>
        <h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>
          Body
        </h3>
        <strong className={"openapi-schema__required"}>required</strong>
      </summary>
      <div style={{ textAlign: "left", marginLeft: "1rem" }}></div>
      <ul style={{ marginLeft: "1rem" }}>
        <SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"bucket_name"}
          required={true}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{
            type: "string",
            description: "Name of the bucket to be provisioned",
          }}
        ></SchemaItem>
        <SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"org_name"}
          required={true}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{
            type: "string",
            description:
              "Name of the organization where the bucket should be provisioned",
          }}
        ></SchemaItem>
        <SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"user_id"}
          required={true}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{
            type: "string",
            description: "ID of the user who is requesting the bucket",
          }}
        ></SchemaItem>
        <SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}>
          <details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}>
            <summary style={{}}>
              <span className={"openapi-schema__container"}>
                <strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>
                  bucket_options
                </strong>
                <span className={"openapi-schema__name"}>object</span>
              </span>
            </summary>
            <div style={{ marginLeft: "1rem" }}>
              <SchemaItem
                collapsible={false}
                name={"public"}
                required={false}
                schemaName={"boolean"}
                qualifierMessage={undefined}
                schema={{
                  type: "boolean",
                  description:
                    "If set to true, the bucket will be publicly accessible. Default is false.",
                }}
              ></SchemaItem>
              <SchemaItem
                collapsible={false}
                name={"storage_class"}
                required={false}
                schemaName={"StorageClass (string)"}
                qualifierMessage={
                  "**Possible values:** [`STANDARD`, `STANDARD_IA`, `GLACIER`, `GLACIER_IR`]"
                }
                schema={{
                  type: "string",
                  description:
                    "Storage class for the bucket. Default is `STANDARD`.",
                  enum: ["STANDARD", "STANDARD_IA", "GLACIER", "GLACIER_IR"],
                  title: "StorageClass",
                }}
              ></SchemaItem>
              <SchemaItem
                collapsible={false}
                name={"enable_object_acl"}
                required={false}
                schemaName={"boolean"}
                qualifierMessage={undefined}
                schema={{
                  type: "boolean",
                  description:
                    "If set to true, per object ACL will be enabled. Default is false.",
                }}
              ></SchemaItem>
            </div>
          </details>
        </SchemaItem>
        <SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"user_role"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"OrgMembership (string)"}
          qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`Admin`, `Member`]"}
          schema={{
            type: "string",
            description: "Role assigned to the user in the organization",
            enum: ["Admin", "Member"],
            title: "OrgMembership",
          }}
        ></SchemaItem>
      </ul>
    </details>
  </TabItem>
</MimeTabs>
